post.content:
Terra Marketing Corp is a market place leader that delivers E-Commerce customer acquisition, product development, customer retention, and information measurement solutions. Our clients are market leaders and acknowledged as among the most trusted brand names.

As a result in our clients' growth, opportunities exist for experienced Web Developers/ masters. Reporting directly to the Business Solutions Manager you will be empowered to maintain and develop online portals. The incumbents will be responsible to design, develop and support web applications.


Key Responsibilities:

Design and develop web applications (web pages, banners and other promotional requirements) based on pre-defined user requirements

Design and develop data interface components between existing applications

Monitor web portals, forums, polls, banner and mail list administration

Act as a web master for the maintenance of large web sites and perform web-programming tasks

Understand online purchasing, online marketing of products etc.


Required Experience/ Skills:

3+ years Strong experience with web applications in Internet/Online marketing environment

Online buying experience i.e.buying from Overture, Altavista

Strong internet marketing skills (postings to websites etc.)

Ability to design and code HTML and Java Scripts for cross-browser compatibility.

Experience with Photoshop, Macromedia products (Dream Weaver, Flash, Home site), ASP, PHP is a must

Personal Attributes:

Must be a team player.

Must have web master capabilities.

Excellent organizational skills.

Work to stringent deadlines in a fast paced environment.

Ability to follow instructions and maintain meticulous attention to detail.

Willing to take initiative and be creative and original.

Must enjoy learning.

Company URL: www.terramc.com

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: Web
